docs.text: Bugg ¶ Documentation for the Bugg ( bugg.xyz ) real-time eco-acoustic monitoring devices. Please note, Bugg is currently in a private preview stage and not available for general purchase. We are working towards a wider launch, but currently this website is only accessible to those with early access. This is a work in progress, so please be patient as more details will follow!
